message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100 for it?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I still can't meet you at $110. I'm looking for something closer to my budget of $100. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
